templates.name: What happened to the Gary's Wayne location?
templates.content: Our company sold the Gary's Wayne store to Buy Rite. During the transition period, customers can place orders with Buy Rite through garysbuyrite.com for pickup or local delivery. These orders will be fulfilled by the Gary's Buy Rite Wayne store, which is located at 1308 Route 23 N, Wayne, NJ 07470. Gary's Wine & Marketplace will continue to own our Madison, Bernardsville, and Closter stores, and we will continue to provide national shipping services through https://garyswine.attn.tv/azTF_8I3LVka and the Gary's Wine Mobile app.

templates.name: Do you price match?
templates.content: We can offer a price match as long as the other store where you found the item is located in NJ.

templates.name: Shipping too expensive
templates.content:
Our shipping costs are what we get charged to ship to you, so the cost is calculated by the shipper from our location relative to yours. 

You can can sign up for our plus program which offers shipping discounts! Here's where you can find more info on that: https://garyswine.com/pages/garys-plus/

templates.name: Do you offer pickup?
templates.content: Yes, we do. Find us at a store near you here: https://garyswine.com/pages/locations To place a pickup order, just choose pickup at checkout. You can also schedule your pickup date at a later date.

templates.name: No promotions available
templates.content: I'm sorry, I don't have any codes available at the moment, but I'd recommend signing up for our newsletter at the bottom of our homepage to stay up to date on the most recent promotions. In the meantime, you can check out our sales collection here:

templates.name: Campaign
templates.content: Great, thanks so much. We'll get that order processed for you! Would you like to do pick up or delivery?

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://support.garyswine.com/portal/en/kb/articles/what-is-gary-s-return-policy

templates.name: Store location
templates.content: You can find us at a store near you here: https://garyswine.com/pages/locations

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We don't currently offer free shipping, but all promos will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out! If you're interested, we do have a program that gives unlimited free shipping/delivery for a one-time annual fee. For more details go here: https://garyswine.com/garys-plus/

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at info@garyswine.com Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at info@garyswine.com Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Cancel / Edit order
templates.content: I can check if that's possible. What's the order number, email address, and the change you'd like to make?

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at info@garyswine.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://instagram.com/garys_wine and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/garyswine

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Orders are processed within 1-2 business days and we usually ship via FedEx. Transit times may vary per state, so I would highly recommend checking out the chart we have here: https://support.garyswine.com/portal/en/kb/articles/what-states-do-you-ship-to#When_will_my_order_arrive:~:text=garyswine.com%2C-,When%20will%20my%20order%20arrive%3F,-Orders%20are%20processed

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at (888) 994-2797 or contact us via the live chat feature on our website. I can also help via text, let me know what I can do for you!

templates.name: Where do you ship to?
templates.content: We ship non-alcoholic items to all states. Shipping wine & other alcoholic items can be complicated since alcohol shipping laws vary from state to state and shipping policies vary by store depending on local policies. If you have a specific question about shipping, please chat with us on our website or email us at info@garyswine.com

templates.name: Can your gift cards be used in the store as well, or only on the website?
templates.content: Our E-Gift cards are digital gift cards that can only be redeemed through our website and mobile app at the moment.

templates.name: Can I place an order over the phone?
templates.content: Please give us a call at (888) 994-2797 and our team will be more than happy to assist you with this!

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://garyswine.com/shop?category=our_discount&title=On+Sale

templates.name: How can I add a gift message/note?
templates.content: We can add a gift message/note to your gift order. At checkout, under "More Options," please click "Yes, it's a gift," then fill out all the necessary information underneath.

templates.name: Gary's Plus Membership Free Shipping
templates.content: The Gary's Plus Shipping subscription requires a $50 minimum order to take advantage of the free ground shipping. You may visit this link for reference: https://garyswine.com/pages/garys-plus/

templates.name: Are the prices increasing due to the Tariffs?
templates.content: At this time, we are not raising the prices for existing items as a result of the tariffs. Additionally, because many of the international products we carry have inventory in the United States, those prices will remain the same. If we purchase items at a higher price down the road, then we will raise prices on our end proportionally to our cost increases. However, we are working with our supplier partners to keep pricing reduced for as long as possible by leveraging inventory that is already state-side.

templates.name: Do I need to show a physical ticket for the Champagne Dinner event?
templates.content: There are no physical tickets for this event. You can show your purchase receipt at the event, and we'll cross-check it with our order sheet.

templates.name: Can you ship beer?
templates.content: Unfortunately, we are unable to ship beer. This is only available for local delivery and pick up at the store.
